title: The Magus
description: Police are called to a murder scene in Fulham. They find a dead body – but no evidence of murder… Two detectives struggle to find out the truth of the matter. But when a mysterious old man claims that the victim was killed by a Satanist, little do they realise their lives will be changed forever…”The first book in the “Magus” trilogy. Suitable for adult readers.
author: Alex Sumner
